chronicKidneyDisease

public int chronicKidneyDisease(java.lang.String creat,
                                java.lang.String prevCreat,
                                java.lang.String gfr)
Chronic Kidney disease: if creatinine > 1.2 on two consecutive encounters Stage 1: GFR >= 90, Stage 2: 60 < GFR < 89, Stage 3: 30 < GFR < 59, Stage 4: 15 < GFR < 29, Stage 5: GFR < 15 creatinine Event_cd = 366653 BUN Event_cd = 366649 GFR EVent_cd = 49946269

Parameters:
creat - value of the creatinine for current encounter
prevCreat - value of the creatinine for previous encounter
gfr - value of the GFR for current encounter
Returns:
: 0 if No Chronic Kidney Disease : 1 if Chronic Kidney Disease
